::KitKat::

She followed the group down the tunnel that Drillbit was making.  She 
reopened her commlink.
"Quickstrike, can you hear me? Damn it! Come in!" the fear was 
evadent in her voice. "If he get's himself killed, I'm going to bring 
him back to life just to kill him myself. A bot in his possition 
doesn't go around scaring the circuits out of his lower ranking 
officers." She chuckled, but it was a nervous chuckle.
